data.actual_result: The channel does not ever get muted and every time the switch is pressed it remains on
data.expected_result: The channel gets muted and then tapping on the mute button the mute switch turns on/off
data.short_description: Muting a channel on the channel settings does not actually mute it and every time the mute button is pressed the switch remains in the on position without actually working
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a server with text channels - Tap the "Mute <channel name>" button - Tap again as many times as you wish
